title: Increased G causes movement left along SRPC

content.prompt: Which of the following would cause a movement from point S to point R on the short-run Phillips curve above?

choices.label: An increase in the labor-force participation rate

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
